6/Al-An'am-59: And with Him are the keys of the Unseen (Gayb). None knows them but He. And He knows what is in the land and the sea. Not even a leaf falls but He knows it. There is not a grain in the darkness of the earth nor anything wet or dry in it but in the Kitab-ı Mübîn (Clear Book).
